briefdescription.para: Graphics subsystem.

UI root modal element.
Cursor.
Currently focused element.
UI rendering batches.
UI rendering vertex data.
UI rendering batches for debug draw.
UI rendering vertex data for debug draw.
UI vertex buffer.
UI debug geometry vertex buffer.
UI element query vector.
Clipboard text.
Seconds between clicks to register a double click.
Seconds from mouse button down to begin a drag if there has been no movement exceeding pixel threshold.
Tooltip default display delay in seconds.
Drag begin event distance threshold in pixels.
Mouse buttons held down.
Last mouse button pressed.
Qualifier keys held down.
Font texture maximum size.
Initialized flag.
Touch used flag.
Flag to switch mouse wheel event to be sent to non-focused element at cursor.
Flag for using operating system clipboard instead of internal.
Flag for showing the on-screen keyboard on focusing a LineEdit.
Flag for using mutable (erasable) font glyphs.
Flag for forcing FreeType auto hinting.
FreeType hinting level (default is FONT_HINT_LEVEL_NORMAL).
Maxmimum font size for subpixel glyph positioning and oversampling (default is 12).
Horizontal oversampling for subpixel fonts (default is 2).
Flag for UI already being rendered this frame.
Non-modal batch size (used internally for rendering).
Timer used to trigger double click.
UI element last clicked for tracking double clicks.
Screen position of first mouse click for double click distance checking.
Max screen distance the first click in a double click can be from the second click in a double click.
Currently hovered elements.
Currently dragged elements.
Number of elements in dragElements_.
Number of elements in dragElements_ with dragPending = false.
UI elements that are being touched with touch input.
Confirmed drag elements cache.
Current scale of UI.
Root element custom size. 0,0 for automatic resizing (default).
Elements that should be rendered to textures.
Construct.
Destruct.

detaileddescription.para: Set cursor UI element. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set focused UI element.

detaileddescription.para: Set modal element. Until all the modal elements are dismissed, all the inputs and events are only sent to them. Return true when successful. Only the modal element can clear its modal status or when it is being destructed.

briefdescription.para: Clear the UI (excluding the cursor).
Update the UI logic. Called by HandlePostUpdate().
Update the UI for rendering. Called by HandleRenderUpdate().

Render the UI. If renderUICommand is false (default), is assumed to be the default UI render to backbuffer called by Engine, and will be performed only once. Additional UI renders to a different rendertarget may be triggered from the renderpath.
Debug draw a UI element.
Load a UI layout from an XML file. Optionally specify another XML file for element style. Return the root element.
Load a UI layout from an XML file. Optionally specify another XML file for element style. Return the root element.
Save a UI layout to an XML file. Return true if successful.

detaileddescription.para: Set clipboard text. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set UI element double click interval in seconds. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set max screen distance in pixels between double click clicks. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set UI drag event start interval in seconds. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set UI drag event start distance threshold in pixels. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set tooltip default display delay in seconds. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set maximum font face texture size. Must be a power of two. Default is 2048. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether mouse wheel can control also a non-focused element. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether to use system clipboard. Default false. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether to show the on-screen keyboard (if supported) when a LineEdit is focused. Default true on mobile devices. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether to use mutable (eraseable) glyphs to ensure a font face never expands to more than one texture. Default false. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set whether to force font autohinting instead of using FreeType's TTF bytecode interpreter. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set the hinting level used by FreeType fonts. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Set the font subpixel threshold. Below this size, if the hint level is LIGHT or NONE, fonts will use subpixel positioning plus oversampling for higher-quality rendering. Has no effect at hint level NORMAL. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set the oversampling (horizonal stretching) used to improve subpixel font rendering. Only affects fonts smaller than the subpixel limit. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set UI scale. 1.0 is default (pixel perfect). Resize the root element to match. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Scale UI to the specified width in pixels.
Scale UI to the specified height in pixels.

detaileddescription.para: Set custom size of the root element. This disables automatic resizing of the root element according to window size. Set custom size 0,0 to return to automatic resizing. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set custom size of the root element.

detaileddescription.para: Return root UI element. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return root modal element. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_modalRoot
Return cursor. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return cursor position. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return UI element at global screen coordinates. By default returns only input-enabled elements.
Return UI element at global screen coordinates. By default returns only input-enabled elements.
Get a child element at element's screen position relative to specified root element.
Convert system mouse position (or offset) to scaled UI position (or offset).
Convert scaled UI position (or offset) to system mouse position (or offset).

detaileddescription.para: Return focused element. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return topmost enabled root-level non-modal element. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return currently dragged elements.
Return the number of currently dragged elements.
Return the drag element at index.

detaileddescription.para: Return clipboard text. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return UI element double click interval in seconds. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return max screen distance in pixels for double clicks to register. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return UI drag start event interval in seconds. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return UI drag start event distance threshold in pixels. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return tooltip default display delay in seconds. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return font texture maximum size. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether mouse wheel can control also a non-focused element. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether is using the system clipboard. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether focusing a LineEdit will show the on-screen keyboard. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether is using mutable (eraseable) glyphs for fonts. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether is using forced autohinting. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return the current FreeType font hinting level. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Get the font subpixel threshold. Below this size, if the hint level is LIGHT or NONE, fonts will use subpixel positioning plus oversampling for higher-quality rendering. Has no effect at hint level NORMAL. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Get the oversampling (horizonal stretching) used to improve subpixel font rendering. Only affects fonts smaller than the subpixel limit. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return true when UI has modal element(s).
Return whether a drag is in progress.

detaileddescription.para: Return current UI scale. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return root element custom size. Returns 0,0 when custom size is not being used and automatic resizing according to window size is in use instead (default). BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set texture to which element will be rendered.
Initialize when screen mode initially set.
Update UI element logic recursively.
Upload UI geometry into a vertex buffer.

memberdef.argsstring: (VertexBuffer *buffer, const PODVector< UIBatch > &batches, unsigned batchStart, unsigned batchEnd)
memberdef.name: Render

briefdescription.para: Render UI batches to the current rendertarget. Geometry must have been uploaded first.

memberdef.argsstring: (PODVector< UIBatch > &batches, PODVector< float > &vertexData, UIElement *element, IntRect currentScissor)

briefdescription.para: Generate batches from an UI element recursively. Skip the cursor element.
Return UI element at global screen coordinates. Return position converted to element's screen coordinates.
Return UI element at screen position recursively.
Return the first element in hierarchy that can alter focus.
Return cursor position and visibility either from the cursor element, or the Input subsystem.
Set active cursor's shape.
Force release of font faces when global font properties change.

memberdef.argsstring: (const IntVector2 &windowCursorPos, MouseButtonFlags buttons, QualifierFlags qualifiers, Cursor *cursor)

UI subsystem. Manages the graphical user interface.
